snippet: Regina Egea, Gov. Chris Christie’s incoming chief of staff, testified at a New Jersey legislative inquiry about the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge.
abstract: Regina Egea, New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's designated future chief of staff, testifies at legislative inquiry about lane closing at the George Washington Bridge.
lead_paragraph: Regina Egea, Gov. Chris Christie’s incoming chief of staff, testified at a New Jersey legislative inquiry about the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge.

headline.main: Lawmakers Press Christie Aide on Her Texting About Lane Closings in Bridge Scandal
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Press Christie Aide on Her Texts About Lane Closings
